document.full_text: as exciting as these playoffs have been, they nonetheless will be an afterthought. once they are completed, the players will almost certainly be locked out, perhaps for a full season.
document.title: looking to europe as lockout looms
lines_and_colors: as exciting as these playoffs have been, they nonetheless will be an afterthought. once they are completed, the players will almost certainly be locked out, perhaps for a full season.
